__e: I've waited too long to find you.
We thought long and hard about it, and we...
So I suggest you think very carefully about what you say next.
To be sure, we'll give him a thorough evaluation.
And I'll take you to the hospital in the first town we arrive in and have them check you thoroughly.
Oh, you do not want me to put a microscope up your ass, 'cause if I do, I will keep looking until I find something.
Well, now, we went over it pretty close, Sam.
If we take her to a doctor, might examine it.
You won't if that casing's examined too thoroughly.
Whoever did it was clever and thorough. I wasn't suggesting that some kind of spirit did it.
Look just as hard and as fast as you can.
If you want to solve a case, you need a thorough investigation
Since you and he were so close I want to be as thorough as poss...
Oh, I'm sure you'll be very thorough.
If I could take a few hours to examine the creature more thoroughly...
My late husband taught me to be thorough.
You'll manage to avoid the worst.
